/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up towards the buildings and the sky, adding a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
